This data is collected from the [PharmGKB](https://www.pharmgkb.org/) which was deposited by N. Tatonetti 
[Data from Data-driven prediction of drug effects and interactions by Tatonetti, et al.](http://stm.sciencemag.org/content/4/125/125ra31.full-text.pdf+html).
This database have consist 645 approved drugsDDI interaction and adverse events data.
